title: 9.1 game crashes
body: just played a game where 2 people on each team all disconnected at exactly the same time and when they all tried to reconnect they were only able to do so for 10-15 seconds before crashing again. happened in my friends ranked game as well but 2 people on his team DC and none on their team

replies.body: Same here. The issue said it had something to do with 3rd party software, which is bullshit because I played a game before and everything worked fine.
Same issue as well, seems like a lot of people experiencing this https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/ZA1pmau8-crashing
Yep, just played a game of vayne where the our jax and talon and the enemy nasus all dced. They would reconnect and leave again every few minutes.

I just got disconnected from a game as with the Nasus Top.
I swear the servers were only just turned back on for ranked games? But they still haven't fixed it.
